entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
